column1: Urgent Opening  For Makeup Artist -  Beauty Advisor
column2: Urgent Opening For Beauty Consultant Profile - TIRA Beauty ( Video Call / Chat / Inbound ) Job description Educate or Suggest clients on skin care procedures and cosmetics products. Provide accurate product and merchandise information to customers. Respond to customer inquiries in a professional manner with Enthusiastic approach. Provided every customer with professional and polite support for sales and service needs. Maintain current store, product and promotional knowledge to drive consistent sales. Prepare and sold broad range of customized merchandise to individuals and commercial accounts. Key skills required Excellent communications skills (English) Knowledge of Makeup, Cosmetics, Skincare Products Diploma in Cosmetology/ CIDESCO Certified / Makeup Course Ability to listen and active problem solving skills Good interpersonal skills Ability to handle pressure Shift Rotational Shift 8 AM - 8 PM (9 hours rotational Day shift) 1 Rotational Week Off No Cab Facility Salary  : 3LPA TO 4.5LPA Age :- 18-35 years * Looking For Immediate Joiner * Interested candidate share resume on below mention no  Contact HR  - Janvi 8452892475 ( Call / Watts up ) Job Location  - Tech Mahindra Ltd, 9th Floor, Empire Tower, Reliable Tech Park , Airoli, Navi Mumbai 400708

column2: We are Looking for Female Beauticians and Make up Artists from every corner of India to work with us as affiliate for our Brand Bellissa Home Service      Range of home Beauty Services we offering from Hair Cutting to Provide typical duties include SPA, Eyebrow, rebonding, pedicure, menicure,face clean up, facial, Mehendi, Nail arts, party makeup, bridal makeup      Affilate Partner should be work on assignment basis under the brand name of Bellissa      And must have been professionaly qualified in the same field with previous work experience
